Title: A Generation Too Late
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Wes Taylor, Alice O'Neill (story editor), Randall Green (story editor), Wes Taylor (story editor)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Chuck faces a dilemma when he's given a perverse directive. Axe expands upon a secret venture. Taylor and Wags interview a different type of Axe Capital employee. Connerty and Dake close in...
